member.name: IAppxBundleManifestReader.GetPackageId
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the <Identity> element under the root <Bundle> element.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestReader.GetPackageInfoItems
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator over all the <Package> elements under the <Packages> element.
member.param: An enumerator over all payload packages in a <Packages> element of a bundle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestReader.GetStream
member.summary: Gets the raw XML document without any preprocessing.
member.param: The read-only stream that represents the XML content of the manifest.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestReader
member.summary: Provides a read-only object model for manifests of bundle packages.
